Main.description: Esta charla es para gente que sabe acerca de Django CMS y quisiera aprender m´as, as´ı como otros que estan buscando una soluci´on CMS. La sesi´on incluir´a un mini-tour, as´ı como una inmersi´on profunda en sus caracter´ısticas principales.
Main.title: Creando paginas web con Django CMS
Main.speaker: Paulo Alvarado

Main.description: Alexa, la asistente personal de Amazon fue la clara ganadora de ´este ´ultimo CES. En esta charla aprenderemos c´omo crear diferentes Skills para interactuar con ella y as´ı poder extender la funcionalidad que ofrece.
Main.title: Creando Skills para Alexa
Main.speaker: Juli´an Amaya

Main.description: Micropython es un proyecto que est´a enfocado en portar Python a microcontroladores para poder tener un f´acil uso y programaci´on, se mostrar´a en la charla las ventajas y desventajas de micropython los usos a futuro y el estado del soporte de distintos microcontroladores.
Main.title: Python en microcontrolodaroes con Micropython
Main.speaker: Gustavo Angulo

Main.description: El video es un tipo de informaci´on que ha crecido de una manera exponencial debido a las facilidades de hoy en d´ıa de grabar video usando dispositivos m´oviles, e igualmente al uso de plataformas como Youtube, Instagram o Snapchat, que han permitido propagar este tipo de informaci´on a nivel mundial. Por ello, es necesario realizar herramientas de auto tag para que la b´usqueda de la informaci´on sea mucho m´as r´apida, poniendo a algoritmos capaces de detectar las actividades que se est´an realizando el video y hacer la respectiva categorizaci´on de forma autom´atica. Para cumplir con este objetivo, se deben tener en cuenta t´ecnicas de visi´on por computador y machine learning (deep learning) que ser´an explicadas durante esta charla
Main.title: Detailed high-level semantic understanding of natural human activities in videos
Main.speaker: Wayner Barrios

Main.description: In this talk the author introduces the basics of data pipelines in the context of Data Engineer and Data Science. Then he describes Luigi, a Python based framework for building Data Pipelines of Batch Processes.
Main.title: Building Data Pipelines with Python
Main.speaker: Miguel Cabrera

Main.description: Julia is a new exciting language for numerical and scientific computation. The aim for this talk is to introduce Julia as a friendly companion to Python in the areas of applied math and numerical evaluation.
Main.title: An introduction to Julia
Main.speaker: David Cardozo

Main.description: It will be a short version of author’s class https://github.com/albahnsen/PracticalMachineLearningClass, using Jupyter notebooks
Main.title: Practical Machine Learning with Scikit-Learn
Main.speaker: Alejandro Correa

Main.description: In this talk the author will describes how Python is central to the success of DESI (Dark Energy Spectroscopic Instrument), a state-of-the-art observational cosmology experiment designed to map the Universe with unprecedented accuracy and detail.
Main.title: Mapping the Universe with Python
Main.speaker: Jaime Forero

Main.description: This talk is aimed for basic and medium level programes who want to learn new ways to think and use functions.
Main.title: Going all function (functional programing with Python)
Main.speaker: Eduardo Galeano

Main.description: Deep Learning is one of the most exciting topics in the world of technology today as it is giving the machines the ability to perform advanced cognitive tasks. Google is one of the companies that has recognized this and has invested millions to create TensorFlow, a distributed computing library capable of running complex tasks of Deep Learning. In this talk we will see the fundamentals of Deep Learning and how to start with TensorFlow
Main.title: Introduccion to Deep Learning with TensorFlow
Main.speaker: Cristian Garc´ıa

Main.description: A basic introduction to web development with Flask, a Python microframework. In this workshop attendees will learn how to connect to a database like MariaDB and the basic structure of a Flask app.
Main.title: Flask: Introduction to Python for Web
Main.speaker: Mario Garc´ıa

Main.description: In this speach, the author will shows how Python can be used to develope Web, Big Data, and Analytical apps. Also, he will covers how is it uses to develope APIs through Google App Engine Applicacion and how is used in the development of new technologies like self-driving car. It is important to mention, that this speach has both business and technical approach, so there will be topics like cost of implementation, and training but also a live code demo.
Main.title: Python as a reliable platform for business innovation
Main.speaker: Andr´es Guijarro

Main.description: ¿Alguna vez so˜naste con viajar y trabajar? ¿En dejarlo todo y perseguir tu sue˜no? ¿o llevar la programaci´on a los lugares m´as rec´onditos? En esta charla se hablar´a sobre la experiencia de llevar Python a m´as de 100 ciudades en 8 pa´ıses de Latinoam´erica durante los ´ultimos 3 a˜nos. Peque˜nas historias, problemas cotidianos, ´exitos y fracasos, eventos realizados y la gran comunidad Python a nivel internacional ser´an los t´opicos de la charla. Esta charla fue Keynote en PyCon Espa˜na 2016 realizada en Octubre
Main.title: Argentina en Python: Comunidad, sue˜nos, viajes y aprendizaje
Main.speaker: Manuel Kauffmann

Main.description: Always find yourself installing dozens of different checkers and figuring out how to run them with CI of your choice? Are you using more than one language and you find it hard to remember all available tools for static analysis? Would you like to define your own checks as easy as possible? Meet coala.io, it feeds on your code and makes it better at the same time.
Main.title: Feed your code to Coala
Main.speaker: Robert Kuska

Main.description: In machine learning and natural language processing, a topic model is a type of statistical model for discovering the abstract ”topics” that occur in a collection of documents. Topic modeling is a frequently used text-mining tool for discovery of hidden semantic structures in a text body. We will survey two of the most used methods: NMF(nonnegative matrix factorization) and LDA (Latent Dirichlet Allocation) and their corresponding implementations in scikit.learn.
Main.title: Unsupervised Topic Modeling in Text Corpora and an effi- cient bag of phrases representation
Main.speaker: Fabian Latorre

Main.description: Django channels puede considerarse como la mejora m´as signi- ficativa a Django en mucho tiempo, adapt´andolo a la nueva forma de ver la Web. Esta charla busca ser una motivaci´on a usar django-channels: una breve introducci´on, su funcionamiento, algunos ejemplos, y una comparaci´on con otras herramientas para manejo de sockets.
Main.title: Django channels - WebSockets and HTTP2 with Django
Main.speaker: Rafael Laverde

Main.description: What do the following technologies have in common: robots that can navigate space and perform duties, search engines that can index billions of images and videos, algorithms that can diagnose medical images for diseases, or smart cars that can see and drive safely? Lying in the heart of these modern AI applications are computer vision technologies that can perceive, understand and reconstruct the complex visual world. This talk is designed to open the doors for people who are interested in learning about the fundament
Main.title: Image Processing and Computer Vision
Main.speaker: Jorge Mart´ınez

Main.description: Una charla acerca de c´omo armar una aplicaci´on avanzada con Flask con todas las funcionalidades que se espera de un framework maduro, y c´omo construir las que hagan falta.
Main.title: Flask - con todas las arandelas
Main.speaker: Vera Mazhuga

Main.description: Learn to use different python libraries to analyze geo-spatial data.
Main.title: Using python to analyze spatial data
Main.speaker: Juan Carlos M´endez

Main.description: Airflow is a platform built in Python to programmatically author, schedule and monitor workflows, in particular ETL jobs. In this talk we give a brief motivation to use a framework for managing workflows (ETL in particular) and present our experience with Airflow in production along with the basics of Airflow: DAGs, Operators, the web UI, the Scheduler and basic deployment process
Main.title: Moving and Transforming Data with Airflow
Main.speaker: Daniel Moreno

Main.description: It would likes to encourage developers to contribute to open source projects.
Main.title: Jazzband
Main.speaker: Camilo Nova

Main.description: Self driving cars are here and Python has a leading role in several of the open source solutions out there. In this talk the author will presents an overview on how python is involved at each level (CAN bus, lane detection, traffic sign recognition, steering using deep learning frameworks like Keras and Tensor- flow).
Main.title: Hacking my car with Python
Main.speaker: Ariel Nu˜nez

Main.description: Gevent es una gran herramienta para la creaci´on de workers en proceso as´ıncrono. En esta charla el autor mostrar´a c´omo empezar, conceptos basicos de as´ıncronismo y como trabajar con Gevent en un caso real.
Main.title: Introducci´on al Gevent
Main.speaker: Vinicius Pacheco

Main.description: En esta charla se har´a una introducci´on a las librer´ıas gr´aficas para la visualizaci´on de datos y creaci´on de aplicaciones din´amicas con controles interactivos
Main.title: Introducci´on a las herramientas para visualizaci´on de datos con Python
Main.speaker: Diego Pe˜na

Main.description: Qt (C++) is a cross-platform application framework that is widely used for developing application software that can be run on various software and hardware platforms with little or no change in the underlying codebase, while still being a native application with native capabilities and speed. All the power of Qt can be harnessed in other languages through the several bindings that exist. Python bindings include PyQt/PySide and allow for the creation of Cross platform desktop applications with much fewer lines of code plus integrations with all the python stack
Main.title: Building Cross Platform Desktop Applications with Python and Qt
Main.speaker: Gonzalo Pe˜na

Main.description: Celery is an asynchronous task queue/job queue based on distributed message passing. It’s a framework/system for building distributed systems that communicate with each other, sending tasks to workers that enables a lot of flexibility developing complex system. Is this talk the author will shows how Celery allows very complex task scheduling options, including chained tasks, several queues, etc.
Main.title: Introduction to Celery for distributed Python development with responsive results (using Docker)
Main.speaker: Sebasti´an Ram´ırez

Main.description: Tornado un framework web para construir servicios as´ıncronos en un solo hilo de ejecuci´on usando gestores de contexto. El workshop tiene una parte te´orica sobre python as´ıncrono (generadores, corrutinas, funciones non-blocking), una sesi´on para construir y testear un servicio web asincrono b´asico con Tornado, una api-rest, un servicio de websockets, un breaker mqtt para aplicaci´ones de internet de las cosas, y finalmente el despliegue con supervisord y nginx
Main.title: Tornado: Web as´ıncrona de alto desempe˜no
Main.speaker: Pedro Rivera

Main.description: La Charla ser´a sobre la arquitectura de OpenEdX, como esta construido su LMS, CMS, breve introducci´on sobre el framework Xblock (framework construido sobre django), django apps de mayor reelevancia dentro de la plataforma, y experiencia del caso de exito de OpenEdX en una universidad.
Main.title: Arquitectura de OpenEdX
Main.speaker: Cristian Salamea

Main.description: ¿Sab´ıas que el Arabe tiene 6 formas de plural? Cosas como esas ´ son las que te encuentras al programar una biblioteca de internacionalizaci´on y localizaci´on para aplicaciones web en Python que NO dependa de gettext. En esta charla se hablar´a sobre este tema y lo genial que es poder contar con Babel.
Main.title: Internacionalizaci´on pyth´onica inspirada en Rails
Main.speaker: Juan Scaletti

Main.description: Artificial intelligence has seen a huge boost in the past couple of years, bigger datasets and more computing power available make a lot of applications like translation, mass scale classifi- cation and tracking possible. In this talk, we present a python based tool developed by MIT called Vatic that is used to track and classify objects in video. We also share our experience annotating different datasets and how it has helped unemployed people in Colombia with temporary well paid gigs. Similarly, we will share our latest research into using Console controllers with ReactJS to gamify the process and allow people to annotate datasets from their couches.
Main.title: Teaching computers how to understand our world
Main.speaker: Lennin Suescun

Main.description: Docker es un gran software que ha cambiado nuestra experiencia como desarrolladores en diferentes empresas. Esta charla est´a enfocada a dar una introducci´on a Docker, y mostrarle a los asistentes como pueden empezar a usar Docker para sus proyectos en Django.
Main.title: From Virtualenv to Docker in Django
Main.speaker: Pablo Vallejo

Main.description: Python como lenguaje de alto nivel permite desarrollar herramientas espec´ıficas para las necesidades biol´ogicas, incluso cuenta con librer´ıas propias para el manejo y an´alisis de estos datos, tales como biopython, bioservice, y pymol, que permiten a un profesional no programador desarrollar herramientas que se ajusten a sus necesidades, como el entendimiento de la relaci´on entre una variaci´on gen´etica a una enfermedad, o teorizar la estructura 3D de una prote´ına hasta la interpretaci´on de rutas metab´olicas de los organismos.
Main.title: Python en Bioinform´atica
Main.speaker: Jenifer V´elez
